# Background

* This is a poster created with Quarto using the Typst system.
* It is based on this template and extension: https://github.com/quarto-ext/typst-templates/tree/main/poster
* Typst can't run code, therefore any tables one want to include need to be generated and saved as figures outside of this document. 
* There is unfortunately currently no robust way to make posters with Quarto yet. If you have suggestions for better Quarto-based alternatives, please let us know!
